text: Ryszard Witke (9 November 1939 â€“ 27 October 2020) was a Polish ski jumper. He competed at the 1964 Winter Olympics and the 1968 Winter Olympics. Witke was born in Sanok, Poland. Witke died on 27 October 2020 in Karpacz, Poland at the age of 80.Ryszard Witke, a two-time Olympian in ski jumping, has died ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Polish skiers
title: Ryszard Witke
